instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.subtitle: How to order with i menu!
instructions.instruction_1: Select products from the menu, touch the product card to add the product.
instructions.instruction_2: Once you've selected your products, press 'view product' to confirm your order.
instructions.instruction_3: Make the payment for your order in cash or through MercadoPago.
instructions.instruction_4: Your order will be on its way!
